Female Administrative Assistant Job at MBIS International




        
    

        
        MBIS International, a reputable Nursery and Primary education, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

Job Position: Female Administrative Assistant

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	This role requires a highly organised and professional individual with demonstrable experience in school administration, strong communication skills and the ability to represent the school effectively as the first point of contact for parents, pupils, staff and visitors.


Key Responsibilities

	Welcoming and attending to parents, pupils, staff and visitors in a professional manner.
	Handling admission enquiries and supporting the admissions process.
	Providing accurate and timely information to parents and stakeholders.
	Assisting staff with administrative requests.
	Liaising with vendors and external providers of extracurricular activities to ensure compliance with safeguarding procedures and smooth delivery of enrichment programmes.
	Maintaining comprehensive records of pupils.
	Actively participating in school meetings, parent information sessions, parent-teacher conferences and parent engagement initiatives.
	Supporting the coordination of school events and activities.


Requirements


	Must reside within commuting distance of Jericho, Ibadan.
	A minimum of two (2) years of relevant post-qualification experience in admissions or administration within an educational establishment (Nursery/Primary school experience will be an advantage).
	A Bachelor’s Degree in Educational Management or Business Administration.
	Demonstrated competence in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint, with excellent keyboarding and correspondence skills.
	Proven ability to maintain accurate and up-to-date records.
	Excellent oral and written communication skills, with keen attention to detail.
	High level of confidentiality, integrity and professionalism.
	Confidence in speech and carriage, with the ability to engage warmly and professionally, while remaining quick-thinking and composed under pressure.


Personal Qualities and Attributes:


	Smart, polished and professional appearance.
	Strong organisational and time-management skills with the ability to prioritise tasks effectively.
	A proactive problem-solver, capable of working independently as well as collaboratively within a team.
	Commitment to upholding the values and standards of the school.


Salary
N100,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their detailed curriculum vitae (CV), a cover letter clearly outlining relevant experience and suitability for the role and a recent full-length photograph to: eyfsrecruitment@gmail.com using "Application – Administrative Assistant" as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

  "title": "Research Assistant",
  "description": "Reftop Homes Limited is a fast-growing real estate development company based in Lagos, Nigeria, focused on providing secure, affordable, and high-value property solutions. With a commitment to integrity and excellence, the company specializes in the sale of land, estate development, and agro-investment projects across strategic locations in Nigeria. Reftop Homes is driven by a vision to help individuals and families build transgenerational wealth through real estate, while delivering exceptional customer service and trustworthy investment opportunities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Research Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Eti Osa, Lagos

Key Responsibilities


	Conduct research on property markets, land use, and housing trends.
	Gather and analyze data on competitors, pricing, and customer demographics.
	Assist in feasibility studies and project planning through data-driven insights.
	Prepare reports, presentations, and summaries for management.
	Support digital and field research activities, including surveys and interviews.
	Maintain databases of research findings for easy reference.
	Provide administrative support to the research and strategy team.


Qualifications &amp; Skills


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Economics, Business, Real Estate, Statistics, or related field.
	Previous experience in research, data analysis, or a related role is a plus.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint); knowledge of data tools (SPSS, Tableau, etc.) is an advantage.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks.
	Self-motivated, curious, and eager to learn.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and cover letter &nbsp;to:&nbsp;coo@reftophomesltd.com.ng&nbsp;using &quot;Research Assistant&quot;&nbsp; as the subject of the email.",
